website_summaries.verdict: A large Disney-themed set with loads of adorable and entertaining details. Sure to put a smile on the face of any Minnie Mouse fan.
pros: Miniature version of Minnie’s Bowtique boasts 2 stories: a downstairs shop with a cash register and merchandise and upstairs bedroom with a bed and windows for double role-playing fun
Includes an outside seating area as well as Minnie Mouse and Daisy Duck figures
Multiple configuration options keep things interesting
cons: Some parents felt the predominantly pink color scheme was a bit too much

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in her Minnie Mouse stage, so it was the best Christmas gift. Obviously, her dad help her to assembly as it suppose to be. But, she enjoys assembly it has she wants. I gave it 4 stars because one piece was missing: the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Aline

customer_reviews.title: Fun Disney Duplo set
customer_reviews.text: Cute Disney-themed addition to the Duplo collection, especially for kids who love the Minnie Bow-Tique shows. Has a rotating bow on top, but the rotating piece can, of course, be used for other building projects. Good value when on sale, as Duplos last from generation to generation!
customer_reviews.author: Jet Dale

customer_reviews.title: Always a big hit with my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves these Disney duplo sets. She never actually makes what is shown in the instructions though. She just makes whatever she wants and is perfectly happy doing so.
customer_reviews.author: hcmitche

customer_reviews.title: ... Lego so really what can u say that is bad about them
customer_reviews.text: These are Lego so really what can u say that is bad about them? I bought these for my granddaughter who is way into Minnie Mouse and she was super excited opening her gift.. they work with the other duplo blocks are made w a heavy plastic and no small pieces that u can step on... These are a great buy and we'll worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 2 year old great niece. She loves the Disney characters and building with the duplo blocks! Her twin brother received Mickey's Play House, so they have a full set of Disney characters and they can build together or play alone.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Pieces for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter for her 4th birthday. It is such a cute set that I had fun playing with it too. You just can't go wrong with Lego. My granddaughter really likes having Minnie and Daisy!
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Find But Got it Here!  Daughter Loved It
customer_reviews.text: This was a hard one to find and luckily a seller had it here. The price was very good ($15 less than a used one I found online) and it came as expected being brand new. With her being 4, the pieces are easy enough for her to put the item together and rugged to where they don't just snap apart with little effort. So far so good and she's happy...that's what matters!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Runyon

customer_reviews.title: We have a 5 year old who has enjoyed Duplos since she was 2
customer_reviews.text: We have a 5 year old who has enjoyed Duplos since she was 2. So well made. All her Duplo sets really encourage her creativity....increasing as she gets older. Adults in our family love to join in, too ;))
customer_reviews.author: jacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality set
customer_reviews.text: My children play with this often. They like to build different versions of the bow shop.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with our three year old
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a huge hit with our three year old. She loves it and is able to work with the various pieces, no problem. Very cute and we got a good price on it. Recommended for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Pry To

customer_reviews.title: Cute set, my daughter loves building a "minnie/daisy" house ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute set, my daughter loves building a "minnie/daisy" house. Lego Duplo brand stands the test of time. Worth the price as we will have it forever.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Duplos have staying power
customer_reviews.text: Great for two year old and is the go to you when other children are over. Box is very helpful for storage.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Freqbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of details for little imaginations
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! Her older sister helped put it together, and the details are great, from baguettes for the picnic table, to actual cloth skirts on the figures, and even a little apartment with bed up above. Certainly happy with the purchase and price.
customer_reviews.author: Momof9

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my Minnie Mouse loving two year old. She gets hours of play out of them while also developing directional and fine motor skills. So happy I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Fun set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old daughter and she loves them. She will play with Duplos all day and this set is just too cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this toy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this toy for a Christmas gift for our two year old granddaughter. She loves it and it provided for long periods of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Little girls should like it.
customer_reviews.text: It's what you expect from LEGO, overpriced but quality items.

customer_reviews.title: Cute characters
customer_reviews.text: Cute characters for young kids and works well with all duplo legos
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: super!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this lego kit, and still uses it together with others.

customer_reviews.title: Great busy toy for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old loves this LEGO set. She can play with it independently for long periods of time!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S.

customer_reviews.title: she loved it! Fast delivery and not missing any pieces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 4 year old grand daughter, she loved it! Fast delivery and not missing any pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Crumrine

customer_reviews.title: lots of special pieces in this set
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year old got this for Christmas and really likes it. There are accessories that complement all the other sets we've gotten with unique pieces (ie. luggage, dresses, Minnie/Daisy/Cuckoo Loca).

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved her birthday gift. Quality and safe for a 3 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps active hands and mind happily busy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect birthday gift for my 2yr old granddaughter - loves Minnie and Mickey Mouse... We visited a few weeks later and it was in use : )

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My niece love it, but a bit overpriced since limited edition from Lego

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product for my granddaughter. A lot of pieces though for a two year old. It will keep mom and dad busy with their child.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for toddler
customer_reviews.text: My little granddaughter loved it, made her squeel with joy!

customer_reviews.title: Very fun

customer_reviews.title: This activity holds our 2 year old’s attention
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly themed pieces. Colorful and perfect size pieces for small hands. Promotes creativity too.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for your little Disney lover! Lots of pieces to let your little one use their imagination.

customer_reviews.title: The Kids Loved it. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and met my expectations.The Kids Loved it. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Great christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a christmas gift four our daighter who is 19 months and loves Minnie Mouse. She and her sister loved it and play with it a lot. We combine it with the Lego Duplo to make bigger scenarios

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, like everything from lego duplo. With many pieces to build many things.

customer_reviews.title: Not too hard to put together and looks really good when it's completed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she loves it. Not too hard to put together and looks really good when it's completed.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who just turned three loved it. She has such fun playing with it but the little skirts are so hard to put on Minnie.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set to include with other Duplo scenes. Lots of storytelling with grandchild!

customer_reviews.text: It’s not very suitable for children. The quality dosen’t match its price.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 year old granddaughter for Xmas. She played with it all day long. Pieces are big enough for her to do by herself

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves it. This Lego has many position so it's always fun

customer_reviews.title: A little too much pink
customer_reviews.text: We love Minnie, but perhaps Lego can tone down the pink a bit. It doesn't have to be all bubble gum pink. The color scheme deters my son from wanting to play with it, and I'd like to expose my daughter to a broader range of colors.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Regret It!
customer_reviews.text: My God daughter loves it and plays with it daily!

customer_reviews.title: Cute Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute lego set. My daughter loved the Minnie and Daphne figurines.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest Duplo set. We've literally been playing with it everyday since Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: My Neice loved this
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift and my neice loved it!

product_meta.title: LEGO DUPLO Brand Disney Minnie Mouse Bow-Tique 10844 Building Kit (70Piece)
product_meta.description: Little fans of Disney's Minnie Mouse will love to practice role-play skills by selling bows and skirts in the shop downstairs, welcoming Daisy duck and sitting outside at the table, and taking Minnie Mouse upstairs for a good night's rest in the bedroom. Help them rebuild the 6174754 in lots of different ways to encourage imagination and develop fine motor skills. Includes 2 LEGO DUPLO figures, plus a Cuckoo figure.
feature_bullets: Build the LEGO Disney Minnie Mouse’s two-story Bow-tique with rotating bow icon and downstairs shop!
Includes Minnie Mouse and Daisy Duck LEGO DUPLO figures, plus a Cuckoo Loca figure
LEGO Disney building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Bow-tique measures 11 inches high, 5 inches wide, and 5 inches deep
70 pieces – For girls and boys between the ages of 2 and 5 years old

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars190 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
